message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one who initiated the game!
Your turn to be reasonable. How about a 55/45 split?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
This is getting us nowhere.  52/48 is my final offer.
You said 52/48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers.
Okay, you drive a hard bargain. 51/49, take it or leave it.
You're getting closer, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about 54.5/45.5?
